thread.section_title: AirportRentals.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirportRentals.com | www.airportrentals.com | 3 of 193
thread.title: Natasvha Guinet

author: Natasvha Guinet
title: Natasvha Guinet
text:
Veru easy website to navigate for people who aren't really tech savvy like me. Payment was easy. Recieved confirmation mail straight away and printable voucher.
Pick up at Perth Airport was a breeze and I even added a navigation system. Thrifty was helpful with maps and directions. The car was exactly as ordered. Clean and fueled up, ready to go.
I gave the wrong time for drop off and realized the night before that my flight was an early morning one and I found contacting them about drop off wascquick and easy.
Will certainly use thier services again.
